## Libraries

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```

### Question 1

```{r}
here::i_am("eval-grades.Rproj")
library(here)
library(vroom)
grades <- vroom("grades.csv")
```

## Simple analyses

### Question 2

```{r}
nrow(grades)
```

The dataset contains 49422 grades.

### Question 3

```{r}
grades |>
  distinct(id) |>
  nrow()
```
The dataset includes 784 distinct students.

### Question 4

```{r}
students <- grades |>
  distinct(id, .keep_all = TRUE) |>
  select(id, group)
students |> slice_tail(n=5)
```

### Question 5

```{r}
ggplot(students, aes(x=group))+
  geom_bar()
```
